Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/16th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 16th, Homan, Douglas, and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 16th, Homan, Douglas, and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/16th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Howard/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses temp rerouted NB Sheridan Rogers Howard Ashland Rogers; SB Howard Rogers Sheridan due to construction at Howard/Rogers

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Howard/Rogers, due to construction.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Rogers, Howard, Ashland, Rogers.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Rogers, Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 6 Jackson Park Exp, J14 Jeffery Jump, 26 South Shore Exp Temporary Northbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Columbus
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Pk Exp, J14 Jeffrey Jump, 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via LSD, 1-55 South, State, Roosevelt, Michigan and Balbo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express, #J14 Jeffery Jump, #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, 1-55 South, State, Roosevelt, Michigan and Balbo., due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Columbus.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Columbus
ShortDescription: SB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 11th, Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Columbus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 11th, Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Columbus.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
